Aug. 31, 1903 D Merthyr Contest
Merthyr Contest 100 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association merthyr-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Sweet Songs of Old
Penydarren Park, Merthyr March contest - 1st Cwmaman, 2nd Gilfach, 3rd Caerphilly. Prizes - 1st £7, 2nd £3, 3rd £1. 7 bands competed.
Aug. 9, 2016, 10:20 a.m. Aug. 17, 2018, 11:07 a.m.
